refnamediv.refpurpose: Printing a Tree in GUI mode

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Display a tree into the a graphic window.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting:
// We should create nodes(subTrees) before creating trees leaf11 = createNode('leaf 1.1') leaf12 = createNode('leaf 1.2') leaf31 = createNode('leaf 3.1') leaf32 = createNode('leaf 3.2') node1 = createNode('Node 1') node2 = createNode('Node 2') node3 = createNode('Node 3') root = createNode('Root') treeNode1 = createTree(node1, leaf11,leaf12) treeNode3 = createTree(node3, leaf31,leaf32) treeRoot = createTree(root, node1,node2,node3)
displaytree(treeRoot)
